definitions.definition: A worker employed at an inn , hostelry , or stable to look after horses .
A railway worker employed to care for a locomotive or other large engine; especially, a yard jockey .

main_definition: A worker employed at an inn , hostelry , or stable to look after horses .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , US ) A railway worker employed to care for a locomotive or other large engine; especially, a yard jockey .
